mapper.select: SELECT s.sendMsgNo, s.sendMsgContent, s.msgWdate, a.receiveId as receiveId FROM send_msg s Inner JOIN address a USING(sendMsgNo) WHERE writerId = #{userId} ORDER BY msgWdate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO receive_msg(writer, receiveId, receiveMsgContent, receiveMsgNo) VALUES(#{writer}, #{receiveId}, #{receiveMsgContent}, #{receiveMsgNo})
mapper.select: SELECT writer, receiveMsgContent, receiveMsgNo, isRead, msgWdate FROM receive_msg WHERE receiveId = #{receiveId} ORDER BY msgWdate DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM receive_msg WHERE receiveId = #{receiveId} AND receiveMsgNo = #{receiveMsgNo}
